companyGoal.title: What company goal does this project work towards?

projectSize.title: How big of a project is this?

hoursSpent.title: How many hours did this take?

expectedHoursSpent.title: How many hours should this project have taken?

onSchedule.title: Was the project completed on or ahead of schedule?

offScheduleReason.title: What prevented the project from being completed on time?

outsideEmployeeControl.title: Was project late due to factors outside of the employee's control?

matchProjectNeedScore.title: How closely did the project the employee completed match what was needed?

hadDeadline.title: Did the project have a deadline?

selfInvolvementScore.title: How involved were you in the project

selfInvolvementNeedScore.title: If the employee completed the project again, how involved would you need to be?

exceptionalJob.title: Did the employee do an exceptionally good job?

badJob.title: Did the employee do a bad job?

withCoworkersScore.title: How well did the employee work with coworkers on this project?

employeeSubstituteScore.title: How hard would it be to find or hire another employee to do this project?

clearExpectationsScore.title: Are expectations for the project clear?

helpfulScore.title: Has the work you have been doing been helpful in meeting company needs for the project?

managerExcessiveScore.title: Did your manager involve themselves too much

skillsNeeded.title: What skills have you needed or will you need on this project?

skillScore.title: What level of proficiency did you need for the skills selected?

areasToImprove.title: What areas can you improve on?

completionPercentage.title: How close is this project to being finished
